scripts.build:main: esbuild src/main.ts --banner:js='import{createRequire as r}from"module";import{fileURLToPath as f}from"url";const{url:u}=import.meta;const require=r(u);const __filename=f(u);const __dirname=f(new URL(".", u));' --banner:js='import { createRequire as topLevelCreateRequire } from "module"; import url from "url"; const require = topLevelCreateRequire(import.meta.url); const __filename = url.fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = url.fileURLToPath(new URL(".", import.meta.url));' --bundle --format=esm --minify --outfile=main.mjs --platform=node --target=es2022
scripts.clean: rimraf assets/*.ico assets/*.png lib/ main.d.ts main.mjs types/
scripts.start: test -r main.mjs && node main.mjs || node --require esbuild-register src/main.ts
